logview.label-footer: Tap ↗️ or ✴️ to open its page.
logview.alert-need-share-activated: To use Export, please activate Share.

options.label-connection1: Search Logger can sync the log with an external App.
options.label-connection2: App needs a plugin to receive logs from Search Logger.
options.label-ignore-recent1: Search Logger skips repeating recent search terms from logging.
options.label-ignore-recent2: You can set how 'recent' to ignore.
